objects.text:
• Hi-Res Audio & Deep Bass
• Noise Reduction Technology
• Comfortable Foam Ear Cups
• Built-in Microphone

product_details.description: Noise Reduction Technology: High Definition Stereo Headphones, noise reduction technology designed to reduce surrounding noise so that you can enjoy what you want to hear. Lose yourself in music even in the lowest volume levels! 40mm sound driver for true richness in sound and deep bass. EASY CONNECTIVITY: Gabba Goods Headphones are compatible with all Bluetooth or 3.5mm plug cable enabled devices such as , iPhones, Smart android phones, Tablet, Laptop, iPads, MP3/4 Player, Computers, MacBook and other Bluetooth devices. Just slide the on/off button and the headphones will be in ready to pair mode. It is built to provide a quick and stable Bluetooth connection and to enable hands-free communication through our special noise reduction technology Super Comfortable design: The Cushioned Ear Muffs are made of artificial leather so that you can wear them for extended time with comfort. The Headset is foldable for easy storage and travel. Great for use by Unisex Kids, Teens and Adults. Built-in microphone: For clear hands-free calling. Enjoy Speaking and Talking Handsfree A highly sensitive microphone that is perfect for capturing clear audio, Micro SD card support: And volume and pause/play functions , allows you to conveniently Listen to Your Favorite Music Audio books, and Podcasts. Brand - Gabba Goods ** Color - Lavender ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Impedance - 26 Ohm **

banner_details:
The banner features a futuristic and vibrant promotional layout for headphones. It uses a diagonal dual-tone gradient background blending rich purples and soft lavenders, enhanced with translucent triangular overlays and subtle circular patterns for depth. The product image ("product_image") of sleek, modern headphones is prominently placed on the right. Headline text ("heading_1" and "heading_2") is stylized with a geometric tech font in white, supporting a clean and sharp appearance. The subheading ("subheading") and feature list ("description") add clarity in a bold and light lavender tone. A bold white price ("price") grabs attention, and a rounded lavender button with dark purple call-to-action ("cta") anchors the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Purple: #6A0DAD
- Violet: #8A2BE2
- Lavender: #E6E6FA
- Light Purple: #D8BFD8
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image highlights a sleek, modern pair of headphones in a soft, elegant purple shade. The primary color palette includes a pastel lavender (#D1B2FF) for the glossy ear cups, a medium orchid tone (#A083C9) for the headband, and a deeper plum (#5E4B8B) for the inner padding. These hues blend smoothly through a gradient finish that emphasizes form and curvature while maintaining a minimalist look. Metallic buttons add contrast with a subtle silver (#E0E0E0) sheen. This cohesive and harmonious palette can be used in branding to evoke sophistication, tranquility, and innovation, ideal for an advertisement targeting premium tech users.
